title: Columbia Men’s Bearmouth Springs Roll Up Flannel Long Sleeve Shirt
description: PLAID STYLE: A button-down with casual plaid style, made from a cotton flannel that softens with age.
COMFORT STRETCH: Crafted from a cotton flannel that offers 2-way stretch, this comfortable shirt makes for versatile wear — from the office to the trail.
CLASSIC STYLE — REGULAR FIT: Cut for that classic style with a regular fit you can count on, this shirt is so comfortable and casual, you can enjoy it anywhere.
EXTENDED SIZES: This garment is available in a wide range of sizes.

BUILT TO LAST: Columbia’s attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart. Specifying only the highest quality materials, expert stitching, and craftsmanship. This is a long-lasting garment you will enjoy for seasons to come.

Constructed from a soft cotton flannel with built-in stretch, this button-down adeptly transitions from dinner to day job to the outdoor activity of your choosing. Cut for a classic fit with several plaid prints to choose from, it’s an essential for fall, winter, and beyond. Columbia offers this long sleeve shirt in multiple colors and sizes.
